Salmon Tartare Crostini
Bread
Citrus Salmon (minus the oranges and sauce)
Avocado Puree
  1. Make citrus marinated salmon, but without cooking it. Wash off the marinade and leave in fridge for flavours to spread through the fish. Mix in a few chives, and serve on toasted bread, with either avocado puree or kewpie mayo
Notes
  • Not sure on the proportions here
Footer. Not much here really. Nice to have a footer though.
